document.discussion_title: Is this Jay Z's other woman?
document.topic_text: Is this Jay Z's other woman? Beyonce fans think so Patrick Ryan, USA TODAY , WXIA 12:47 PM. GMT April 25, 2016 Many believe that Roy came between Bey and Jay. (Photo: (Joe Scarnici/Getty Images; AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill)) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST Beyonc√© is spilling some major tea , err, Lemonade on her jaw-dropping surprise release. Ever since her HBO special and Tidal-exclusive album premiered Saturday, the Beyhive has been buzzing about Queen B's searing, pointed lyrics ‚Äî many of which indicate that husband Jay Z may have cheated on the pop superstar. Loading... Patrick Riviere, 2002 Getty Images Scott Gries Frederick M. Brown, 2002 Getty Images Chris Hondros Robert Mora, 2002 Getty Images Frank Micelotta, 2003 Getty Images Scott Gries Kevin Winter, 2003 Getty Images Steve Finn, 2003 Getty Images Jamie McCarthy, 2015 Getty Images Jamie McCarthy, 2015 Getty Images Christopher Polk, 2016 Getty Images Ezra Shaw, 2016 Getty Images Matt Cowan, 2016 Getty Images Matt Cowan, 2016 Getty Images Isaac Brekken, 2015 Getty Images Michael Buckner, 2014 Getty Images Christopher Polk, 2014 Getty Images Pascal Le Segretain, 2015 Getty Images Mike Coppola, 2015 Getty Images Dimitrios Kambouris, 2014 Getty Images Buda Mendes, 2013 Getty Images Buda Mendes, 2013 Getty Images Mark Davis, 2014 Getty Images Dimitrios Kambouris, 2015 Getty Images Jason Merritt, 2011 Getty Images Mike Coppola, 2015 Getty Images Handout, 2015 Tom Ford Kevork Djansezian, 2014 Getty Images Christopher Polk, 2013 Getty Images Jason Merritt, 2015 Getty Images of Autoplay Pause Show Thumbnails Show Captions The allegations reached a fever-pitch thanks to Sorry, a defiant non-apology to a partner whose misbehavior makes her "regret the night I put that ring on." Tired of his excuses, and threatening to leave with her child, she ends the song with this bit of casual shade: "I see them boppers in the corner, they sneaking out the back door. He only want me when I'm not there, he better call Becky with the good hair." So who is Becky? Many people on Twitter have speculated that it could be fashion designer Rachel Roy, who posted a photo on Instagram hours after Lemonade's debut with the caption: ‚ÄúGood hair don‚Äôt care, but we will take good lighting, for selfies, or self-truths, always. live in the light #nodramaqueens.‚Äù While the post is no longer available, some Instagram users did manage to screengrab it: A photo posted by ‚ìÖeople‚ìâalk ‚íπaily‚Ñ¢ (@peopletalkdaily) on Apr 24, 2016 at 10:25am PDT Beyonc√© fans flooded her comments as a result with bee and lemon emojis, and allegedly changed her Wikipedia page to say, "Next on Beyonc√©'s Hit List." (Although it has been restored to normal, at the time of publication.) Rachel Roy's comment section in shambles #beehive üò© pic.twitter.com/Y6YcBvS8zS ‚Äî Geespin (@geespin) April 24, 2016 As for Roy's Instagram account? She has since made it private , although she did address accusations in a tweet: I respect love, marriages, families and strength. What shouldn't be tolerated by anyone, no matter what, is bullying, of any kind. ‚Äî Rachel Roy (@Rachel_Roy) April 24, 2016 May want to cool it, Beyhive. 'Yonce has this handled.
